document.full_text: a convicted bank robber pleaded not guilty on friday to arson and explosives charges stemming from a botched attempt to bomb a shopping mall near columbine high school on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
document.title: suspect indicted in colorado mall bombing attempt
lines_and_colors: a convicted bank robber pleaded not guilty on friday to arson and explosives charges stemming from a botched attempt to bomb a shopping mall near columbine high school on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
